name: Nordic.AI
goal:
Nordic.AI's mission is to build a Nordic AI platform
through a coordinated, community-based movement for international outreach

The purpose is to promote regional and international recognition of the Nordic AI & ML ecosystem. We work towards:

Strong Nordic collaboration and understanding of the local ecosystems.

International awareness of the Nordics as a skilled AI & ML hub.

Forum for showcasing and discussing AI in context of Nordic values
euInitiatives:
Nordic.AI works to promote regional growth of the artificial intelligence ecosystem in the Nordics and growing collaboration between the Nordic AI ecosystem and other EU ecosystems.

The primary EU initiatives currently followed by Nordic.AI are the Digital Single market Digitising European Industry Strategy, where we work with strengthening Digital Innovation Hubs.
Nordic.AI is also a primary community initiative supporting AI companies in the Nordics who receive H2020 funding and work with AI.
We help promote and foster especially more investments into AI (be that from non-EU as well a EU) and to create more AI based startups - which is why we are so community focused.
